summary: THE TRANSMISSION HAS FAILED 4 TIMES.  IT HAS BEEN REPAIRED 4 TIMES WITH NO EFFECT.  THE DEALER DROVE IT OVER 300 MILE TO "TEST DRIVE" THE CAR.
